original: 通體由異種神竹所製，堅不可摧，平日攜行絲毫不露殺氣，上陣掃敵，下馬掃地，具備狂風般的力量。乃居家行旅，出門防身之必備武器！
text: The whole body is made of a different kind of divine bamboo. It is indestructible. It is carried without any murderous intent. It sweeps the enemy and dismounts the horse. It has the power of the wind. It is an indispensable weapon for home travel and self-defense!
